original_text: The days of Adam after he fathered Seth were 800 years; and he had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 아담은 셋을 낳은 후 팔백 년을 지내며 자녀들을 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: The days of Adam after he fathered Seth were 800 years
and he had other sons and daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 다른 아들들과 딸들을 낳았다
